title: Children Of Bodom - I Worship Chaos (2015)
description:
I Worship Chaos is the upcoming ninth studio album by Finnish melodic death metal band Children of Bodom. It will be released on October 2, 2015.[1] It is the first album since Hate Crew Deathroll to not feature guitarist Roope Latvala due to his departure from the band in May 2015, making this the band's first album as a four-piece group with Alexi Laiho handling all guitar duties.

For the first time, the band didn't use a commercial recording studio. Instead they opted to use a converted warehouse to enhance the ambiance of the sound.

This is the first album since Something Wild that uses the standard C# tuning but in two songs only: Hold Your Tongue and Suicide Bomber, while the rest of the songs use the drop B tuning.

All songs written and composed by Alexi Laiho.
